name: 3 Seasons
storyline: The story follows our MC as she attends a mysterious job interview, only to find herself whisked away to the elemental realm. There she meets 3 handsome men: the spirits in charge of Winter, Summer and Fall. Due to the Spring spirit's disappearance, she winds up taking over his tasks until his scheduled return. Will she manage to get closer to one of these interesting strangers in the short time they have together?
summary: A slice of life, romance and fantasy dating sim featuring 3 love interests, romance/friendship routes and an original soundtrack.
